name: Infiltration (itch) (JiaxinHuang)
description:
Ever since the rise of a mysterious organization, villagers have started to disappear. From the girl next door to the bakery owner down the street to your very own twin brother. The police have done nothing to help solve this problem, so you decided to sneak in the enemy’s territory to find your brother and the rest of the villagers. ‘Infiltration’ is a 3D platformer in which the player infiltrates into the mysterious organization to save the villagers and bring down the opponent.

Gameplay Mechanics: Left click on mouse to fire, arrow keys to walk, mouse to rotate camera, space to jump
